name: Pactica
description:
Ship #5174 a.k.a Pactica is tasked by the Omega Galatic Federation to search through Galaxy X and collect stars. Unbeknownst to Patica was that enemy ships plagued the area. Collect all the starts before the enemey does.

This game was done for project 1 of DIG4715C, Pactica's gameplay mirrors the gameplay of Pacman and is stylistically inspired by Galaga!
